casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Billy BOWDEN, Jr. No. 600P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of December 2007 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review to the Supreme Court of North Carolina:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
